channel.title: cshotton tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from cshotton.

item.description: @b05crypto When the Venn Diagram of gamers and crypto-bros are not concentric circles, you might get people to let go of Discord. (I agree, though, Discord is not pro grade gear.)
@b05crypto @pgpsam @SturdyFinance This sheds a little more light on the NY fossil fuel crypto mining ban. I guess it pays to actually read the legislation... https://t.co/RgPk4krqeo
@HMNDomains I want my free .hmn #nftdomain from @app_cortex and @ButterflyProto sent to 0xffecfd7b3e13cc3e59c0e747885b4626a7cd4aa7
